title: The Truth
description: So, I'm a girl, called Jasmine Jackson, who walks down the roads of the High Street wearing full-showing clothes, who likes messing around with the wrong people, who likes getting drunk at night, who likes bunking off school, arguing with family and making fun of nuns. But there's got to be more to life than just having fun. Isn't there a purpose to all this? What happens when I die? Is it all for nothing? Well, after meeting Marium Mahmood, my life is going to change forever... Read my story to find out how my heart led me to Islam...
author: Anfal Khaliq
